   21: %%
   22: -module(mnesia2_extra_light_SUITE).
   23: -author('hakan@erix.ericsson.se').
   24: -compile([export_all]).
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: -include("mnesia2_test_lib.hrl").
   27: 
   28: init_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   29:     mnesia2_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   30: 
   31: end_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   32:     mnesia2_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   33: 
   34: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   35: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[{ts_install_cth,[{nodenames,2}]}]}].
   36: 
   37: %% Verify that Mnesia2 really is a distributed real-time DBMS.
   38: %% This is the test suite of the Mnesia2 DBMS. The test suite
   39: %% covers many aspects of usage and is indended to be developed
   40: %% incrementally. The test suite is divided into a hierarchy of test
   41: %% suites where the leafs actually implements the test cases.
   42: %% The intention of each test case and sub test suite can be
   43: %% read in comments where they are implemented or in worst cases
   44: %% from their long mnemonic names.
   45: %%
   46: %% The most simple test case of them all is called 'silly'
   47: %% and is useful to run now and then, e.g. when some new fatal
   48: %% bug has been introduced. It may be run even if Mnesia2 is in
   49: %% such a bad shape that the test machinery cannot be used.
   50: %% NB! Invoke the function directly with mnesia2_SUITE:silly()
   51: %% and do not involve the normal test machinery.
   52: 
   53: all() ->
   54:     [{group, extra_light}, clean_up_suite].
   55: 
   56: groups() ->
   57:     %% The 'extra_light' test suite runs am even smaller
   58:     %% than light selected set of test suites and is
   59:     %% intended to be the smallest test suite that is meaningful
   60:     %% to run. It starts with an installation test (which in essence is the
   61:     %% 'silly' test case) and then it covers all functions in the API in
   62:     %% various depths. All configuration parameters and examples are also
   63:     %% covered.
   64:     [{extra_light, [],
   65:       [{group, install}, {group, nice},
   66:        {group, mnesia2_frag_test, light}, {group, qlc},
   67:        {group, registry}, {group, config}, {group, examples}]},
   68:      {install, [], [{mnesia2_install_test, all}]},
   69:      {nice, [], [{mnesia2_nice_coverage_test, all}]},
   70:      {qlc, [], [{mnesia2_qlc_test, all}]},
   71:      {registry, [], [{mnesia2_registry_test, all}]},
   72:      {config, [], [{mnesia2_config_test, all}]},
   73:      {examples, [], [{mnesia2_examples_test, all}]}].
   74: 
   75: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
   76:   ct:print(default, 50, "starting test group: ~p", [GroupName]),
   77: 	Config.
   78: 
   79: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
   80:   ct:print(default, 50, "ending test group: ~p", [GroupName]),
   81: 	Config.
   82: 
   83: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   84:     Config.
   85: 
   86: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   87:     Config.
   88: 
   89: 
   90: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   91: 
   92: clean_up_suite(doc) -> ["Not a test case only kills mnesia2 and nodes, that were"
   93: 			"started during the tests"];
   94: clean_up_suite(suite) ->
   95:     [];
   96: clean_up_suite(Config) when is_list(Config)->
   97:     mnesia2:kill(),
   98:     Slaves = mnesia2_test_lib:lookup_config(nodenames, Config),
   99:     Nodes = lists:delete(node(), Slaves),
  100:     rpc:multicall(Nodes, erlang, halt, []),
  101:     ok.
  102: 
  103: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
